about.title: About
about.metaDescription: Learn about the story, development motivation and mission of Product Latest, dedicated to providing the best product showcase card generation tool for product enthusiasts
about.storyP1: Hi, I'm an independent developer, and Product Latest was created from my own needs and observations.
about.storyP2: As a loyal user of Product Hunt, I often want to share great products I discover on social media and blogs. However, simple links lack visual appeal, and ordinary screenshots fail to highlight key product information and aesthetics.
about.storyP3: I noticed tools like TwitterShots on Twitter that create beautiful tweet cards, and Mastopoet on Mastodon that generates attractive post screenshots. This made me wonder: why can't the great content on Product Hunt have a similar display method?
about.storyP4: After researching the Product Hunt API, I realized it was entirely possible to build a tool that allows users to easily create professional, beautiful product showcase cards. This was the opportunity for Product Latest to be born — a tool that can transform product information on Product Hunt into beautiful cards, helping creators, product managers, and tech enthusiasts better share the products they love.
about.storyP5: From the initial concept to implementation, I focused on user experience and design aesthetics, hoping that every card generated through Product Latest could accurately convey product value while being visually attractive.
about.missionP1: The mission of Product Latest is simple: to make sharing great products more beautiful, convenient, and professional.
about.missionP2: I believe that great products should be seen by more people, and the way they are presented affects the speed and breadth of their spread. By providing diverse templates and customization options, I hope to help each user find the presentation method that best suits their needs.
about.missionP3: With the development of social media and content creation, the demand for cross-platform content sharing is growing. Product Latest fills this gap, allowing users to easily share excellent content from Product Hunt to various platforms.
about.contactP1: I value feedback and suggestions from every user. If you have any questions, ideas, or cooperation intentions, please feel free to contact me:
about.contactP2: Thank you for using Product Latest! I will continuously improve to provide you with a better product showcase experience.
about.inspirationP1: The development of Product Latest was inspired by the following excellent projects:
about.twittershots: A tool for creating beautiful tweet screenshots
about.thanks: Special thanks to the API provided by Product Hunt, which allows me to obtain rich product data.

guide.title: User Guide
guide.metaDescription: Product Latest User Guide - Learn how to use our tool to create beautiful Product Hunt product showcase cards, including detailed steps for entering product links, customizing content and styles, exporting images, and more
guide.intro: Welcome to Product Latest, a Product Hunt card generator designed for product enthusiasts. Whether you're a product manager, entrepreneur, or tech enthusiast, you can use it to create beautiful product cards and share them on social media.
guide.introFollowup: Let's go through how to use this tool step by step.
guide.step1Desc: Paste the Product Hunt product link in the input field on the homepage.
guide.step1Tip: You can also directly enter the product's slug (the last part of the link), such as "voltops-llm-observability-platform".
guide.step2Desc: After entering the product link, the system will automatically redirect to the editor page, where you can see the generated product card.
guide.step2Adjust: In the editor, you can adjust the following:
guide.contentEditingDesc: Modify product name, tagline, description, link, logo, etc.
guide.textStyleDesc: Modify font size, color, weight, alignment, etc.
guide.cardDesignDesc: Adjust the card's background color, border radius, shadow, aspect ratio, etc.
guide.displayOptionsDesc: Choose to show or hide elements such as logo, tagline, upvotes, comments, etc.
guide.step3Desc: When you are satisfied with the card, click the "Export Image" button to save the card as an image file.
guide.step3Options: You can adjust the following export options through the "Export Settings" button:
guide.imageFormatDesc: Choose from PNG, JPEG, or WebP formats
guide.resolutionDesc: Choose from standard (1x), HD (2x), Ultra HD (3x), or 4K (4x) resolution
guide.faq1Q: Q: Why can't I fetch data from the product link I entered?
guide.faq1A: A: Please ensure you've entered a valid Product Hunt product link, which usually follows the format https://www.producthunt.com/products/[product-name]. If you still can't fetch data, it could be due to incorrect information on Product Hunt or temporary API unavailability.
guide.faq2Q: Q: Can I customize the content on the card?
guide.faq2A: A: Yes, in the "Content" tab of the editor, you can modify information such as product name, tagline, description, link, and logo. These modifications only affect the card you generate and do not change the original data on Product Hunt.
guide.faq3Q: Q: What about the quality of the exported images?
guide.faq3A: A: You can choose different resolutions according to your needs, ranging from standard (1x) to 4K (4x). High-resolution options ensure that images remain clear in various scenarios, particularly suitable for high-resolution displays or print materials.
guide.faq4Q: Q: Is there a fee for using this tool?
guide.faq4A: A: Currently, all features are provided for free. We aim to help product enthusiasts better share and promote the products they love.
guide.contactMessage: If you have any questions or suggestions about using the tool, feel free to contact me
